tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE preferences (
  customer_id INT,
  room_number INT,
  wifi_preference VARCHAR(255),
  tv_preference VARCHAR(255),
  ac_preference VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
	customer_id INT,
	preference_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY(customer_id, preference_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (preference_id) REFERENCES amenities(amenity_id)
);
CREATE TABLE customers (id INT, name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(255), age INT, address VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE amenities (id INT, amenity_name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (customer_id INT, amenity_id INT, rating INT, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id), FOREIGN KEY (amenity_id) REFERENCES amenities(id))
CREATE TABLE ratings (id INT, rating_value INT, PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE logs (log_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, action_taken VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (log_id))
